page.title: 05Pilgrim Hall, Easons Green.
page.content: Pilgrim Hall is a Christian Hotel and Conference Centre. It is open all year and caters for 120 people, accommodating about 7,000 per year. It welcomes visitors from all Christian denominations and is extensively used by religious groups from Britain and abroad as well as families and parties such as the elderly and girl guides. The bedrooms on the ground floor cater for disabled people. The centre was formerly a private house. Now, the 8 acre site and grounds, which include a swimming pool, tennis court, croquet and putting greens, is owned by an Evangelical Trust. Conferences are held in a large hall which is an extension to the original house. the centre has its own library and self-service book and record shop.
